title: Beautiful
review: First of all I loved the storyline, and the attention to detail - particularly within the dialogue. It's slow realism, so won't appeal to the mainstream audience (maybe). So glad I've seen this. Very surprising for Netflix indeed.

title: Brilliant film
review:
I loved every minute of this film. The acting was so realistic and believable, I liked that it was filmed in real time as well as it was like you were with them looking in.
Very good.

title: Not nominated for Feel Good Movie of the Year
review: Being a slow burn, this film is best for a (possibly mature) Canadian or Indie film fan and features superb acting. Kudos all around.
